description:
Have you ever wondered, how a team can manage a complex project quite successfully?

For example, the construction of a mall, which spans over a number of years and involves a number of teams working efficiently.

This module helps you understand what PMP is and how you can apply it in your project management.
learning_outcomes: Bare minimum knowledge of project management
pre_requisites: An open mind to learn any new concepts
short_description: You can learn project management by applying the simple methods of project management. How you can apply project management in each and every step of your deliverables? Let's figure it out.

tasks.task_description: As a project manager, you play an important reole in leading a project through initiation, planning, execution, monitoring, controlling and completion. How? Do you want to manage each and every step of your life?

assets.asset_description:
Story of Alignment
Scope of Agility
Specific Accountable
Staggering Approach
Watch the video and thread build, and jot out key threads while watching that video.
Write a 400-500 word article, from your thread. Publish your understanding, and showcase your understanding to the entire world.

title: Technical Project Management
